channel.title: Final Devolution 2.9.1 BIG UPDATES!
channel.description:
Hey,Back with a final devolution update,
Well basically i just added new Friends list and Ignore list, I also added the f2p shops (JUST THEW CFG FILES)
Also fixed some Npc Overlapping and few more Npc Clipping!
Banking fixes you can now use quickly bank booth not just use. Also added a bank pin system only 20% tho.
Npcs Over your level dont randomly attack you now but some do because its not totally done. But the Kbd still does as usual. [b] CHANGE!
YOU WILL NOW NEED TO USE A BLUURS CLIENT TO CONNECT I CHANGED IT TO FIX THE FUNNY ARCHER HEMLETS ALL OVER THE PLACE! SO THE MAP LOOKS 100% CLEANER![/b]
[b]Download :[/b] http://uppit.com/v/3S3RZW1I
